Usage: ember [x1B][33m<command (Default: help)>[x1B][39m

Available commands in ember-cli:

ember addon [x1B][33m<addon-name>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Generates a new folder structure for building an addon, complete with test harness.
  [x1B][36m--dry-run[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -d[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--blueprint[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: addon)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -b <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-npm[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sn[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-bower[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sb[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-git[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sg[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--yarn[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--directory[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -dir <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--lang[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Sets the base human language of the addon's own test application via index.html
  [x1B][36m--ci-provider[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(travis, github)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: github)[x1B][39m Installs the default CI blueprint. Either Travis or Github Actions is supported.

ember asset-sizes [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Shows the sizes of your asset files.
  [x1B][36m--output-path[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Path)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: dist/)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -o <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--json[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m

ember build [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Builds your app and places it into the output path (dist/ by default).
  [x1B][90maliases: b[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--environment[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: development)[x1B][39m Possible values are "development", "production", and "test".
    [x1B][90maliases: -e <value>, -dev (--environment=development), -prod (--environment=production)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--output-path[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Path)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: dist/)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -o <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--watch[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -w[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--watcher[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--suppress-sizes[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m

ember destroy [x1B][33m<blueprint>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Destroys code generated by `generate` command.
  [x1B][90maliases: d[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--dry-run[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -d[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--pod[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -p, -pods[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--classic[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -c[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--dummy[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -dum, -id[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--in-repo-addon[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: null)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: --in-repo <value>, -ir <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--in[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: null)[x1B][39m Runs a blueprint against an in repo addon. A path is expected, relative to the root of the project.

ember generate [x1B][33m<blueprint>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Generates new code from blueprints.
  [x1B][90maliases: g[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--dry-run[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -d[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--pod[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -p, -pods[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--classic[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -c[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--dummy[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -dum, -id[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--in-repo-addon[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: null)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: --in-repo <value>, -ir <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--lint-fix[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--in[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: null)[x1B][39m Runs a blueprint against an in repo addon. A path is expected, relative to the root of the project.

ember help [x1B][33m<command-name (Default: all)>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Outputs the usage instructions for all commands or the provided command
  [x1B][90maliases: h, --help, -h[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--json[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m

ember init [x1B][33m<glob-pattern>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Reinitializes a new ember-cli project in the current folder.
  [x1B][36m--dry-run[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -d[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--blueprint[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -b <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-npm[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sn[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-bower[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sb[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--lint-fix[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--welcome[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m Installs and uses {{ember-welcome-page}}. Use --no-welcome to skip it.
  [x1B][36m--yarn[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--name[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: "")[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -n <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--lang[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Sets the base human language of the application via index.html
  [x1B][36m--embroider[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m Enables the build system to use Embroider
  [x1B][36m--ci-provider[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(travis, github)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: github)[x1B][39m Installs the default CI blueprint. Either Travis or Github Actions is supported.

ember install [x1B][33m<addon-name>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Installs an ember-cli addon from npm.
  [x1B][90maliases: i[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--save[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -S[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--save-dev[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -D[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--save-exact[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -E, --exact[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--package-manager[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(npm, pnpm, yarn)[x1B][39m Use this option to force the usage of a specific package manager. By default, ember-cli will try to detect the right package manager from any lockfiles that exist in your project.
    [x1B][90maliases: -yarn (--package-manager=yarn), -pnpm (--package-manager=pnpm)[x1B][39m

ember new [x1B][33m<app-name>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Creates a new directory and runs [x1B][32member init[x1B][39m in it.
  [x1B][36m--dry-run[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -d[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--blueprint[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: app)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -b <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-npm[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sn[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-bower[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sb[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--skip-git[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -sg[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--welcome[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m Installs and uses {{ember-welcome-page}}. Use --no-welcome to skip it.
  [x1B][36m--yarn[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--directory[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -dir <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--lang[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Sets the base human language of the application via index.html
  [x1B][36m--embroider[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m Enables the build system to use Embroider
  [x1B][36m--ci-provider[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(travis, github)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: github)[x1B][39m Installs the default CI blueprint. Either Travis or Github Actions is supported.

ember serve [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Builds and serves your app, rebuilding on file changes.
  [x1B][90maliases: server, s[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--port[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Number)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: 4200)[x1B][39m To use a port different than 4200. Pass 0 to automatically pick an available port.
    [x1B][90maliases: -p <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--host[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Listens on all interfaces by default
    [x1B][90maliases: -H <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--proxy[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -pr <value>, -pxy <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--proxy-in-timeout[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Number)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: 120000)[x1B][39m When using --proxy: timeout (in ms) for incoming requests
    [x1B][90maliases: -pit <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--proxy-out-timeout[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Number)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: 0)[x1B][39m When using --proxy: timeout (in ms) for outgoing requests
    [x1B][90maliases: -pot <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--secure-proxy[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m Set to false to proxy self-signed SSL certificates
    [x1B][90maliases: -spr[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--transparent-proxy[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m Set to false to omit x-forwarded-* headers when proxying
    [x1B][90maliases: --transp[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--watcher[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: events)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -w <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--live-reload[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: true)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -lr[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--live-reload-host[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Defaults to host
    [x1B][90maliases: -lrh <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--live-reload-js-url[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m The absolute URL used to load livereload.js. If specified, this overrides the liveReloadPort option.
  [x1B][36m--live-reload-options[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Stringified JSON object for LiveReload options. LiveReload supports a number of options for configuring websocket communication, including https, host, port, and others. See https://git.io/JzgLG for details.
    [x1B][90maliases: -lro <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--live-reload-base-url[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Defaults to baseURL
    [x1B][90maliases: -lrbu <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--live-reload-port[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Number)[x1B][39m Defaults to same port as ember app
    [x1B][90maliases: -lrp <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--live-reload-prefix[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: _lr)[x1B][39m Default to _lr
    [x1B][90maliases: --lrprefix <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--environment[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: development)[x1B][39m Possible values are "development", "production", and "test".
    [x1B][90maliases: -e <value>, -dev (--environment=development), -prod (--environment=production)[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--output-path[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Path)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: dist/)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -op <value>, -out <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--ssl[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m Set to true to configure Ember CLI to serve using SSL.
  [x1B][36m--ssl-key[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: ssl/server.key)[x1B][39m Specify the private key to use for SSL.
  [x1B][36m--ssl-cert[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: ssl/server.crt)[x1B][39m Specify the certificate to use for SSL.
  [x1B][36m--path[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Path)[x1B][39m Reuse an existing build at given path.

ember test [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Runs your app's test suite.
  [x1B][90maliases: t[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--environment[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: test)[x1B][39m Possible values are "development", "production", and "test".
    [x1B][90maliases: -e <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--config-file[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -c <value>, -cf <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--server[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -s[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--host[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -H <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--test-port[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Number)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: 7357)[x1B][39m The test port to use when running tests. Pass 0 to automatically pick an available port
    [x1B][90maliases: -tp <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--filter[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m A string to filter tests to run
    [x1B][90maliases: -f <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--module[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m The name of a test module to run
    [x1B][90maliases: -m <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--watcher[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: events)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -w <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--launch[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m A comma separated list of browsers to launch for tests.
  [x1B][36m--reporter[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Test reporter to use [tap|dot|xunit] (default: tap)
    [x1B][90maliases: -r <value>[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--silent[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m Suppress any output except for the test report
  [x1B][36m--ssl[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m Set to true to configure testem to run the test suite using SSL.
  [x1B][36m--ssl-key[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: ssl/server.key)[x1B][39m Specify the private key to use for SSL.
  [x1B][36m--ssl-cert[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: ssl/server.crt)[x1B][39m Specify the certificate to use for SSL.
  [x1B][36m--testem-debug[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m File to write a debug log from testem
  [x1B][36m--test-page[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m Test page to invoke
  [x1B][36m--path[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Path)[x1B][39m Reuse an existing build at given path.
  [x1B][36m--query[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(String)[x1B][39m A query string to append to the test page URL.
  [x1B][36m--output-path[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Path)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -o <value>[x1B][39m

ember version [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  outputs ember-cli version
  [x1B][90maliases: v, --version, -v[x1B][39m
  [x1B][36m--verbose[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m


Available commands from dummy-addon:
ember foo [x1B][33m<speed>[x1B][39m [x1B][36m<options...>[x1B][39m
  Initializes the warp drive.
  [x1B][36m--dry-run[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Boolean)[x1B][39m [x1B][36m(Default: false)[x1B][39m
    [x1B][90maliases: -d[x1B][39m
